bug.author: bee-san
bug.description: ┌─[shardion@horizon]───[~/apks]───[04:34] └─[$]─[0] ciphey - test_base64 Format used: utf8 base64 Final result: "test base64 output " Appears to only be with Hex. Also you have a weird newline there, there's a little trick to print you can use to ignore the newline. print("test_str",end="")

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.91. Please mark this comment with 👍 or 👎 to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
That's intended. If you run echo AA | base64, it gives you the base64 encoding of 414120, as echo appends a newline.
